vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H4135B', 'matchingForm': 'מָלַל', 'stepTransliteration': 'ma.lal', 'gloss': 'to circumcise', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '受割禮, 割禮', '_es_Gloss': 'circuncidado', '_zh_Gloss': '受割礼, 割礼'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4136', 'matchingForm': 'מוּל', 'stepTransliteration': 'mul', 'gloss': 'opposite', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '前, 面', '_es_Gloss': 'delante', '_zh_Gloss': '前, 面'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4139', 'matchingForm': 'מוּלָה', 'stepTransliteration': 'mu.lah', 'gloss': 'circumcision', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '割禮', '_es_Gloss': 'circuncisión', '_zh_Gloss': '割礼'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to circumcise, let oneself be circumcised, cut, be cut off
1a) (Qal) to circumcise
1b) (Niphal) to be circumcised, circumcise oneself
1c) (Hiphil) to cause to be circumcised
1c1) of destruction (fig.)
1d) (Hithpolel) to be cut off
1e) (Polel) cut down
§ 1) to circumcise, let oneself be circumcised, cut, be cut off
1a) (Qal) to circumcise
1b) (Niphal) to be circumcised, circumcise oneself
1c) (Hiphil) to cause to be circumcised
1c1) of destruction (fig.)
1d) (Hithpolel) to be cut off
1e) (Polel) cut down
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   circuncidar; (b) nif.   ser circuncidado; (c) hif.   mantener lejos
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 行割禮
1a) (Qal) 行割禮
1b) (Niphal) 受割禮, 自行割禮
1c) (Hiphil) 使受割禮 (藉武力對敵軍強行)
1d) (Hithpolel) 被切除 #詩 58:7|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 行割礼
1a) (Qal) 行割礼
1b) (Niphal) 受割礼, 自行割礼
1c) (Hiphil) 使受割礼 (藉武力对敌军强行)
1d) (Hithpolel) 被切除 #诗 58:7|

1a) (Qal)
1b) (Niphal)
2) (Hithpolel) to be cut off
